record.title: PERMISSION FOR MEMBER TO BE CONSIDERED AS FIRST SPONSOR OF H.R. 1172

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mr.
speaking-unknown-id.name: WAXMAN
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that I may hereafter be considered as the first sponsor of H.R. 1172, a bill originally introduced by Representative Millender-McDonald of California, for the purposes of adding cosponsors and requesting reprints pursuant to clause 7 of rule XII.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from California?
